CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that time calculator is updated for both visible and hidden requests.

Clicked 'xhr' button.

Appended request [a] of type 'script' is hidden: true from [1] to [2]
Timeline: from [1] to [2]

Appended request [b] of type 'xhr' is hidden: false from [3] to [4]
Timeline: from [1] to [4]

Appended request [c] of type 'script' is hidden: true from [5] to [6]
Timeline: from [1] to [6]
